description:

His dragon tattoo suits him, and he looks great riding around shirtless on his motorcycle. He says he is gonna get his other shoulder done, which I kind of think would be too much.
Caleb was also one of those videos that was filmed in realtime. The whole process turned him on. Even for the photos, I would step out of the room to let him get hard, and I barely had time to get comfortable to "wait" before he was calling me in to show off his big 'ole boner.
Cute kid, amazing ass and dick. HOT!
Don't forget it's 2-4-2sday! Check out the other uncut hottie

title: Caleb - Solo
